channel.title: Need help with teleport and drop!
channel.description:
1) how can i add (or edit) teleport in the spell book. for exemple, i want to change my varrock teleport to a monster teleport.
2) how can i allow player to drop? because actually when i drop something its write: your item diseappear on the ground..
its a 317 server plz i need help

item.title: Need help with teleport and drop!
item.dc:creator: @tomjrmkay tomjrmkay
item.description:
@tomjrmkay wrote:

It would depend on your server base. Look in the file that controls drops from monsters and see what method they use to make the items appear on the ground, and use that method for dropping items.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with teleport and drop!

item.title: Need help with teleport and drop!
item.dc:creator: @sirmashni1 sirmashni1
item.description:
@sirmashni1 wrote:

tomjrmkay:

No don’t delete the deleteitem just add another method below that to make the item show up on the ground.

ah ok but do you know what to add? because im not good with java coding lol

item.title: Need help with teleport and drop!
item.dc:creator: @sirmashni1 sirmashni1
item.description:
@sirmashni1 wrote:

i saw this in client.java

// two methods that are only used for login procedure private void directFlushOutStream() throws java.io.IOException { out.write(outStream.buffer, 0, outStream.currentOffset); outStream.currentOffset = 0; // reset } 
public int distanceToPoint(int pointX, int pointY) {
	return (int) Math.sqrt(Math.pow(absX - pointX, 2)
			+ Math.pow(absY - pointY, 2));
}
public void dropItem(int droppedItem, int slot) {
	// misc.printlnTag("droppeditem ["+playerItems[slot]+"] which is
	// ["+(droppedItem+1)+"]");
	boolean a = true;

deleteItem(droppedItem, slot, playerItemsN[slot]);
sM(“Your item disappears into the ground…”);
//}

is it deleteItem(droppedItem, slot, playerItemsN[slot]); the problem?

Read full topic
